mdq:check.name: Resource Service Provider Present
mdq:check.description: Check that a service provider is present.
mdq:check.code:
def call(): global output global status global serviceProvider
import metadig.variable as mvar
# A data service provider is not present if 'serviceProvider' not in globals() or serviceProvider is None: output = "No service provider was found." status = "FAILURE" return False
serviceProvider = mvar.toUnicode(serviceProvider)
# If only a single value is returned (vs type "list"), then convert to a list # for easier processing if(isinstance(serviceProvider, unicode)): serviceProvider = [serviceProvider]
if (mvar.isBlank(serviceProvider)): output = "The service provider is blank." status = "FAILURE" return False else: # Check if resource identifier type is a single string or arrayList if(len(serviceProvider) == 1): output = u"The service provider '{}' was found".format(serviceProvider) else: output = u"The service provider '{}' was found (first of {} providers)".format(serviceProvider[0].strip(), len(serviceProvider)) status = "SUCCESS" return True
